channel.title: Tryton Van Meer
channel.description: Recent content on Tryton Van Meer

item.title: Yes, I am a Linux gamer!
item.description: Linux is my platform of choice for not only daily computing, but also gaming. And I am happy to say I enjoy it quite a lot. Steam I might not be able to play all the latest AAA games, but I still have more games to play than I have time. Since I stopped using Windows, I’ve also made a point to only buy games that support Linux. There are currently 416 games in my Steam library.

item.title: About
item.description: Programmer Who Loves Linux and Computer Hardware Projects Dotfiles Github Configs for Linux systems. ProtonDB for Steam Github Firefox Add-Ons Firefox extension that shows ratings from protondb.com on Steam Dungeon Journal Github Flathub GTK application for managing 5e characters. Written in Vala. Hiritsu Github AUR CLI tool for getting aspect ratio of files. Written in Rust (Formally in Python). PKGBUILDS Github PKGBUILDs for Arch Linux Hardware Desktop - Caffeine PC CPU AMD Ryzen 5 2600 CPU Cooler AMD Wraith Max Motherboard MSI B350 TOMAHAWK Memory G.
